message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product but $180 is a bit out of my budget.  Would you be willing to do $100 for it?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle for $140?
I appreciate your willingness to come down in price, Alice.  $140 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. Would you consider $120?  That's my absolute limit for this product.
I understand your limit, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. How about we meet at $130?
Alice, I really want this product, but $130 is still a stretch for me.  Would you consider $125?  That's the absolute maximum I can do.
I understand you're really close to your limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $127?
Alice, I'm getting closer to my absolute limit. How about we settle at $125? That's the very last compromise I can make.
I understand you're really close to your limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $126?
Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm going to have to stick with my last offer of $125.  If it's not acceptable, I'll have to look elsewhere.
